scripts.e2e:start-db: npm run e2e:cleanup-db && cd ../app && wasp start db
scripts.e2e:start-app: npm run e2e:wait-for-db && cd ../app && wasp db migrate-dev --name test-run && wasp start
scripts._comment-on-e2e:cleanup-db: NOTE: the name of the DB container, e.g. name=^wasp-dev-db-OpenSaaS-, is generated by wasp and will match the name of the app definition in your `main.wasp` file, e.g. `app OpenSaaS { }`
scripts.e2e:cleanup-db: (docker container rm $(docker container ls -f name=^wasp-dev-db-OpenSaaS- -q) -f || true) && docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -f name=^wasp-dev-db-OpenSaaS- -q) -f || true
